amendment.description: To make available, with an offset, additional amounts for defense basic research programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2492 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2492 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12592-12593) To make available, with an offset, additional amounts for defense basic research programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2492 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2492 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kennedy.
